protein.general_function: Involved in transferase activity, transferring phosphorus-containing groups
protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the last step of tRNA splicing, the transfer of the splice junction 2'-phosphate from ligated tRNA to NAD to produce ADP-ribose 1''-2'' cyclic phosphate (Probable).

go_class.description: rna splicing, via endonucleolytic cleavage and ligation
trna splicing, via endonucleolytic cleavage and ligation
tRNA splicing, via endonucleolytic cleavage and ligation

reference.reference_text: Hu QD, Lu H, Huo K, Ying K, Li J, Xie Y, Mao Y, Li YY: A human homolog of the yeast gene encoding tRNA 2'-phosphotransferase: cloning, characterization and complementation analysis. Cell Mol Life Sci. 2003 Aug;60(8):1725-32.
